text: Ronald Runaldo Venetiaan (born June 18, 1935) is a Surinamese politician and mathematician. He served as the 6th and 8th President of Suriname. His first term as president ran from 1991 to 1996. In 2005 he was re-elected to serve a third term as president and sworn in on August 12, 2005. ==References== ==Other websites== Category:1935 births Category:Living people Category:Presidents of Suriname Category:Mathematicians
title: Ronald Venetiaan
